title: [Icemule Trace, Snowfield]
description: There is no distinguishing feature in the midst of all the snow.  You squint your eyes against the blowing wind and snow.  Trails lead this way and that across the snowfield.
There is no distinguishing feature in the midst of all the snow.  You squint your eyes against the brightness of your surroundings.  Trails lead this way and that across the snowfield.
